review: Im not going to tell you that you have to watch this film or to avoid it like the plague.My personal opinion is that this film is superb, a genuine masterpeice.As with all things, some people dont get or just dont like it.My advice would be, to watch this film as soon as possible. If you like the film, then you'll be glad you followed this advice, as you will love it.If you dont like it, then fine, but at least you tried it.
